formalpara.title: Figure 2. Venn diagram of germline gene sets
formalpara.para: The wild type vs. glp-4 (diminished germ line) data set was combined with the fem-1(lf) (oocytes only) vs. fem-3(gf) (sperm only) data set to generate the displayed set of genes with germline-enriched expression patterns. Reprinted with permission from Reinke et al., 2004.
